member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PNContacts.DlgAuth.InitializeComponent

member.name: T:PNContacts.GContacts
member.summary: Represents class for retrieving contacts information (full name/primary e-mail address) from Google

member.name: M:PNContacts.GContacts.Authenticate
member.summary: Authenticates client on Google server and retrieves access and refres tokens
member.returns: True if authentication was successfull, false otherwise

member.name: M:PNContacts.GContacts.RefreshAccessToken
member.returns: True if access token has been refreshed successfully, false otherwise

member.name: M:PNContacts.GContacts.GetContacts
member.summary: Gets list of full name/primary e-mail address pairs of contacts
member.returns: List of full name/primary e-mail address pairs of contacts, where item1 of entry represents full name and item2 - e-mail address
